name: Otiose, or A Sublime Reckoning With Lackluster
name_original: Otiose, or A Sublime Reckoning With Lackluster
description:
Disclaimer: This game uses Windows Text To Speech, and thus may function unpredictably on other operating systems.

Description

Short game demo for my Games and/as Literature class, ENGL 255 in Summer 2022. Designed to support an accompanying essay, and deal with aspects of and responses to disillusionment for game creators and scholars.

Controls

Mouse - Look
WASD - Movement
E - Interact
